newsitem.title: POLAND: DELOITTE & TOUCHE MERGES WITH POLISH AUDITING FIRM.
newsitem.headline: DELOITTE & TOUCHE MERGES WITH POLISH AUDITING FIRM.

text.p: The Polish unit of Deloitte & Touche Tohmatsu International has merged with a regional Polish auditing firm Providum, its head said on Wednesday.

"As a result of the merger we would like to gather all the features which clients value in local auditing firms, such as Providum, and those for which they respect international auditors," Laslaw Paga told a news conference.
Providum was created in 1991 and employs 35 people. It has officies in Konin, Elblag, Kalisz, Lublin and Legnica.
